item.title: The RYDE Carpool Challenge will begin in April
item.description: Singapore’s carpooling app, RYDE, has teamed up with Cycle & Carriage for the RYDE Carpool Challenge. The grand prize? A Mitsubishi Attrage. The eight-month campaign, which began on April 1, 2016, aims to have RYDE users complete a collective carpool distance of 1,000,000km, thus reducing carbon emissions by 200,000kg. By encouraging carpooling, RYDE hopes to promote a more environmentally friendly mode of transportation. Each month, RYDE will select two winners: the rider and driver with the highest number of successful carpools.

item.title: Cachet Hotel Group unveils the fresh appearance of URBN Shanghai
item.description: The Cachet Hotel Group (CHG) has revamped its stylish URBN Hotel in Shanghai, a former warehouse. Led by CHG’s renowned fashion designer, Jay Godfrey, the updated interiors offer guests a modern, zen-like ambiance. The use of recycled and reclaimed wood materials adds a natural touch, further enhanced by the neutral color scheme. Source: CHG. The Jay Godfrey Courtyard Suite. Photo - http://photos.prnasia.com/prnh/20140911/0861406560 The URBN Shanghai boasts a unique Jay Godfrey-designed suite.
